      • openFile

        public static void openFile(String fileName,
                            String[] executables)
                     throws Exception
        Tries to open the given file with the most appropriate application. In Windows the Start command will be used in MAC OS the open command will be used and for other systems the platform tries to find the given executable
        Parameters:
        fileName - file to open
        executables - possible programs to launch
        Throws:
        Exception - if error
